alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:41PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lenawee County through 830 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Pioneer to near Fayette to near Wauseon. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Morenci around 800 PM EDT. Hudson around 815 PM EDT. Clayton around 825 PM EDT. Addison around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Seneca, Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Lime Creek, Munson, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Sand Creek, Jasper, Medina and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
